name: Bears Runner City
description:
Bears Runner City game where you help the panda to reach his coin by run, roll, dash, slide and jump over challenging obstacles encounter continuously. There are some boost powers in the game like the speed zone starting , speed zone and snail, the super jumping zone also the best jungle graphics.

How to play

. Jump - Tap to jump or roll the panda
. Drag/swipe to jump or slide/sub and to move left or right
. Tap on screen to jump the panda, gap and the obstacles
. Keep running until panda reaches end of the path
